Record.definition:
CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_OPTIONS_INS_SP" ( P_OPTION_CODE IN VARCHAR2, P_OPTION_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_OPTION_DESCRIPTION IN VARCHAR2, P_IS_SYSTEM IN NUMBER, P_IS_ACTIVE IN NUMBER, P_CREATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1, P_DATA_TYPE IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT 'string', P_API_ENABLED IN NUMBER DEFAULT 0, P_MULTI IN NUMBER DEFAULT 0
) IS V_ID NUMBER; BEGIN SELECT CMN_OPTIONS_S1.NEXTVAL INTO V_ID FROM DUAL; INSERT INTO CMN_OPTIONS ( ID, OPTION_CODE, IS_SYSTEM, IS_ACTIVE, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, API_ENABLED, MULTI_VALUED, DATA_TYPE ) SELECT V_ID, P_OPTION_CODE, P_IS_SYSTEM, P_IS_ACTIVE, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, P_API_ENABLED, P_MULTI, P_DATA_TYPE FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'OPTION EXISTS' FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = P_OPTION_CODE); CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS_INS_SP ( 'CMN_OPTIONS', V_ID, P_OPTION_NAME, P_OPTION_DESCRIPTION, P_CREATED_BY, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL ); END;
